outline.title: The Weight of Legacy
outline.summary: Alexander Blackwood returns to his family's stronghold, Eldrador, after a decade away. He is greeted with both expectation and suspicion by the castle's inhabitants, who are wary of his intentions. Meanwhile, Eira Shadowglow arrives in town, seeking information about a mysterious prophecy that speaks of her return. Arin the Unyielding watches from the shadows, sensing an opportunity to redeem himself.

outline.title: The Web of Deceit
outline.summary: As Alexander navigates the treacherous landscape of Eldrador's politics, he is drawn into a web of intrigue and deception. Eira Shadowglow becomes embroiled in a local conflict between rival factions vying for control of the kingdom's magical resources. Arin the Unyielding reveals himself to Alexander, offering guidance and support in his quest for power. But can they trust each other?

outline.title: The Shadows Within
outline.summary: As the forces of darkness gather outside Eldrador's walls, Alexander, Eira, and Arin must confront their own demons to save the kingdom. In a shocking revelation, Alexander discovers a dark secret about his family's past that threatens to destroy everything he holds dear. Can they overcome their internal struggles to protect Eldrador and its people?
